body:
Comment 4 by **lucio.dere**: 
I seem to have isolated the error to:

myrtle$ hg bisect
The first bad revision is:
changeset:   17680:3c7cac86a284
user:        Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>
date:        Mon Aug 12 13:05:40 2013 -0400
summary:     cmd/8g: factor out prog information

I can't quite see how the change affected this particular issue, but it's quite a big
change and the details are not clear to me.

Lucio.
